Name: Vikings
History: Norse people primarily from southern Scandinavia. From the late 8th to late 11th centuries, Vikings raided and traded from their Northern European homelands across wide areas of Europe, and explored westwards to Iceland, Greenland, and Vinland.

Technologies.Name: Skremmende
Technologies.History: Vikings where a frightening view with their war paintings and they where very fast on foot
Technologies.Description: Increased attack and movement rate for melee soldiers.

Technologies.Name: Raiding Partier
Technologies.History: Woe to the Defeated! The Vikings live by raiding!
Technologies.Description: A set amount of metal and food from every structure destroyed or captured.

Heroes.Name: Erik the Red
Heroes.History: Erik the Red is a figure who embodies the Vikings’ bloodthirsty reputation more completely than most. Ultimately, Erik ended up founding Greenland, but that was only after he’d been banished from Iceland for murdering several men.

Heroes.Name: Leif Erikson
Heroes.History: Leif is generally considered to have been the first European to set foot in North America, a full 500 years before Christopher Columbus. The son of Erik the Red, Leif is thought to have arrived in the New World in around 1000, having ventured off course en route to Greenland. His crew set up camp in a place he dubbed “Vinland”, thought to be Newfoundland.

Heroes.Name: Ragnar Lothbrok
Heroes.History: Norse Viking hero, as well as Danish and Swedish King, known from Viking Age Old Norse poetry, Icelandic stories, and near contemporary chronicles. According to the traditional literature, Ragnar Lodbrok distinguished himself by many raids against the British Isles and Holy Roman Empire during the 9th century.

CivBonuses.Name: Fjelloppdrett
CivBonuses.History: Farming/ranching production in Scandinavia was scarse, but they made the most out of it.
CivBonuses.Description: Enhanced food gained from ranching and farming.

CivBonuses.Name: Seerland
CivBonuses.History: Scandinavians trusted seers visions. While present, they will inspire the soldiers fight more fiercly.
CivBonuses.Description: Druids increase attack rates of soldiers near them slightly.

TeamBonuses.Name: Seers
TeamBonuses.History: Being a seer is a calling, not an occupation.

Structures.Name: Mølle
Structures.History: Vikings version of the rotary flour mill.
